title: JSC Sivershchyna And Slobozhanshchina DirecTion Rusian Army Shelled Leonivka, Senkivka of Chernihiv Region, Klusa, Sergiyivka ...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Leonivka, Senkivka of Chernihiv region, Klusy, Serhiyivka, Simeykyne of Sumy region, Veterynarne, Vysoka Yaruha, Krasne of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Bobylivka of Sumy region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
